column1: Our MSc in Health Psychology covers the application of psychological theories, research and methodologies to the study of health and disease processes. ThisBritish Psychological Societyaccredited, master's course is ideal for those looking for a career in health psychology.Using a blend of research-led teaching and practical experiences, on this course you will explore:
FeesPlease see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
1 Year Full Time / 2 Years Part Time
